SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowView

java.lang.Object
  com.xtremelabs.robolectric.shadows.ShadowView
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShadowImageView, ShadowSurfaceView, ShadowTextView, ShadowViewGroup
@Implements(value=android.view.View.class)
public class ShadowView
extends java.lang.Object

Shadow implementation of View that simulates the behavior of this class. Supports listeners, focusability (but not focus order), resource loading, visibility, tags, and tracks the size and shape of the view.

Non-Android accessor.

checkedPerformClick

public boolean checkedPerformClick()
Utility method for clicking on views exposing testing scenarios that are not possible when using the actual app.

Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - if the view is disabled or if the view or any of its parents are not visible.
